name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$', required, example:crayfish
username: base64 encoded username, STRING, required, example:eGppbW15
platform: support platform of region, STRING, [ec2-classic|ec2-vpc|default-vpc|custom-vpc], required
description: description of stack, STRING, not required
owner: base64 encoded owername(reserved for guest), STRING, not required
key: for thumbnail url of stack, not required, example:0KmcthfkEKGIHKgEov3Wbe4es3cqpF6Hw0hiCNbm0iXQYy8WGb6wNuF+mvqqPO5TdGFjayBrZXk=
tag: tag for stack(reserved), STRING, not required

$AZ0.name: regex az, STRING, '^(ap|us|eu|sa){1}-(south|east|west|north){1,2}-[0-9]{1}[a-z]{1}$', required, example:us-east-1a
$AZ0.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $AZ0

$INSTANCE0.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$', required, example:host1
$INSTANCE0.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $INSTANCE0
$INSTANCE0.index: index of instance in server group, INT(>=0), required
$INSTANCE0.number: instance number in server group, INT(>=1), required
$INSTANCE0.serverGroupUid: server group uid, STRING, required, UID
$INSTANCE0.serverGroupName: server group name, STRING, required, regex, ^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$, eg:host1
$INSTANCE0.state: state data for visualops, ARRAY, default []

resource.InstanceId: regex instance id(filled by RW), STRING, 'i-\w{8}', not required
resource.VpcId: reference or regex vpc id, STRING, @xxxx.resource.xxxx or 'vpc-\w{8}', not required
resource.SubnetId: reference or regex subnet id, STRING, @xxxx.resource.xxxx or 'subnet-\w{8}', not required

Placement.Tenancy: The tenancy of the instance(for vpc), STRING, [dedicated|*default], not required

SecurityGroupId: reference, STRING, @xxxx.resource.xxxx, required for classic mode, example:@$DEFAULT-SG.resource.GroupId
SecurityGroup: reference, STRING, @xxxx.resource.xxxx, required for classic mode, example:@$DEFAULT-SG.resource.GroupName

$VOLUME0.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$', required, example:/dev/sdf
$VOLUME0.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $VOLUME0
$VOLUME0.index: index of volume in server group, INT(>=0), required
$VOLUME0.number: volume number in server group, INT(>=1), required
$VOLUME0.serverGroupName: server group name, STRING, required, regex, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$', eg:/dev/sdf

resource.VolumeId: regex volume id(filled by RW), STRING, 'vol-\w{8}', not required,
resource.SnapshotId: regex snapshot id,'snap-\w{8}', required when volume create from a snapshot

AttachmentSet.#VolumeId: regex volume id,'vol-\w{8}', not required, example:@$VOLUME0.resource.VolumeId

$DEFAULT-SG.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$, required', example:'DefaultSG'
$DEFAULT-SG.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $DEFAULT-SG

resource.GroupId: regex SG ID(filled by RW), STRING, 'sg-\w{8}', not required
resource.VpcId: reference or regex vpc, STRING, @xxxx.resource.xxxx or 'vpc-\w{8}', required for VPC, example:@$VPC.resource.VpcId

IpPermissions.IpRanges: reference or sg id or account number or ip range, STRING, required, example:0.0.0.0/0
IpPermissions.IpProtocol: STRING, [tcp|udp|icmp] for EC2, [tcp|udp|icmp|-1,65535] for VPC, required, example:tcp
IpPermissions.FromPort: from port for tcp/udp, type for icmp, INT, [-1,65535], required, example:22
IpPermissions.ToPort: to port for tcp/udp, code for icmp, INT, [-1,65535], required, example:22

$DEFAULT-KP.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$, required', example:DefaultKP
$DEFAULT-KP.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $DEFAULT-KP

$EIP0.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$', not required
$EIP0.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $EIP0

resource.PublicIp: regex IP(filled by RW), STRING, '\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+', not required
resource.PrivateIpAddress: reference eni private ip, STRING, @xxxx.resource.xxxx, not required, example:@ENI0.resource.PrivateIpAddressSet.0.PrivateIpAddress

$ENI0.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$', not required, example:eni0
$ENI0.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $ENI0
$ENI0.index: index of eni in server group, INT(>=0), required
$ENI0.number: eni number in server group, INT(>=1), required
$ENI0.serverGroupUid: server group uid, STRING, required, UID
$ENI0.serverGroupName: server group name, STRING, required, regex, ^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$, eg:eni0

resource.NetworkInterfaceId: regex  eni id(filled by RW), STRING, 'eni-\w{8}', not required
resource.SubnetId: reference or regex subnet, STRING, @xxxx.resource.xxxx or 'subnet-\w{8}', not required, example:@$SUBNET0.resource.SubnetId
resource.VpcId: reference or regex vpc, STRING, @xxxx.resource.xxxx or 'vpc-\w{8}', not required, example:@$VPC.resource.VpcId

PrivateIpAddressSet.PrivateIpAddress: regex IP, STRING, '\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+', not required, example:10.0.0.4

$ELB0.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$, required', example:load-balancer-1
$ELB0.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $ELB0

resource.VpcId: reference, STRING, @xxxx.resource.xxxx, 'regex vpc,vpc-\w{8}', not required, example:@$VPC.resource.VpcId
Subnets: reference or regex subnet, STRING, @xxxx.resource.xxxx or 'subnet-\w{8}', not required, example:@$SUBNET0.resource.SubnetId
reference or regex subnet, STRING, @xxxx.resource.xxxx or 'subnet-\w{8}', not required, example:@$SUBNET1.resource.SubnetId
SecurityGroups: reference, STRING, @xxxx.resource.xxxx, required for vpc, example:@$ELB0-SG.resource.GroupId

Listener.SSLCertificateId: reference, STRING, required for HTTPS and SSL, example:@SERVER-CERTIFICATE.resource.ServerCertificateMetadata.Arn

$SERVER-CERTIFICATE0.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$', not required, example:'aaa'
$SERVER-CERTIFICATE0.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $SERVER-CERTIFICATE0

resource.PrivateKey:
required, example:-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
...
-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----

$VPC.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$, required', example:'vpc'
$VPC.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $VPC

resource.VpcId: regex vpc id(filled by RW), STRING, 'vpc-\w{8}', not required
resource.CidrBlock: regex IP range, STRING, '\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+/\d+', required, example:10.0.0.0/16

$DHCP.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$', not required, example:default
$DHCP.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $DHCP

resource.DhcpOptionsId: regex dhcp id(filled by RW), STRING, 'dopt-\w{8}', not required

$IGW.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$', not required, example:'Internet-gateway'
$IGW.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $IGW

resource.InternetGatewayId: regex IGW id(filled by RW), STRING, 'igw-\w{8}', not required

$VGW.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$', not required, example:'VPN-gateway'
$VGW.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $VGW

resource.VpnGatewayId: regex VGW id(filled by RW), STRING, 'vgw-\w{8}', not required

$SUBNET0.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$', not required, example:subnet1

resource.SubnetId: regex subnet(filled by RW), STRING, 'subnet-\w{8}', not required
resource.CidrBlock: regex IP range, STRING, '\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+/\d+', required, example:'10.0.0.0/24'

$ROUTETABLE0.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$', not required, example:'RT-1'
$ROUTETABLE0.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $ROUTETABLE0

resource.RouteTableId: regex RT id(filled by RW), STRING, 'rtb-\w{8}', not required

RouteSet.DestinationCidrBlock: regex IP range, STRING, '\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+/\d+', required, example:'10.0.0.0/16'

RouteSet.GatewayId: reference, STRING, @xxxx.resource.xxxx,or  Valid value,'local', not required, example:@$IGW.resource.InternetGatewayId

AssociationSet.SubnetId: reference to subnet id or empty, STRING, @xxxx.resource.xxxx, required when Main is false

$DEFAULT-ACL.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$', not required, example:'DefaultACL'
$DEFAULT-ACL.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $DEFAULT-ACL

resource.NetworkAclId: regex ACL(filled by RW), STRING, 'acl-\w{8}', not required

EntrySet.CidrBlock: reference or regex IP range, STRING, @xxxx.resource.xxxx or '\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+/\d+', required, example:0.0.0.0/0
reference or regex IP range, STRING, @xxxx.resource.xxxx or '\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+/\d+', required, example:0.0.0.0/0

AssociationSet.NetworkAclAssociationId: regex acl assoc id(filled by RW), STRING, 'aclassoc-\w{8}', not required
regex acl assoc id(filled by RW), STRING, 'aclassoc-\w{8}', not required

$VPN0.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$', not required, example:'VPN'
$VPN0.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $VPN0

resource.VpnConnectionId: regex VPN ID(filled by RW), STRING, 'vpn-\w{8}', not required

$CGW0.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$', not required, example:'customer-gateway-1'
$CGW0.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $CGW0

resource.CustomerGatewayId: regex CGW(filled by RW), STRING, 'cgw-\w{8}', not required

$ASG0.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$, required', example:'asg1'
$ASG0.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $ASG0

resource.AutoScalingGroupARN: regex ARN(filled by RW), STRING, '^arn:aws:\w+:[a-zA-Z0-9-]*:[0-9]*:', not required

$LAUNCH-CONFIGURATION0.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$, required', example:'launch-config-1'
$LAUNCH-CONFIGURATION0.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $LAUNCH-CONFIGURATION0
$LAUNCH-CONFIGURATION0.state: state data for visualops, ARRAY, default []

resource.LaunchConfigurationARN: regex LC(filled by RW), STRING, '^arn:aws:\w+:[a-zA-Z0-9-]*:[0-9]*:', not required

$CLOUD-WATCH0.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$', not required, example:'asg1-policy-1-alarm'
$CLOUD-WATCH0.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $CLOUD-WATCH0

resource.AlarmArn: regex ARN(filled by RW), STRING, not required

$SCALING-POLICY0.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$, required', example:'asg1-policy-1'
$SCALING-POLICY0.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $SCALING-POLICY0

resource.PolicyARN: regex ARN(filled by RW), STRING, not required

$NOTIFICATION-CONFIGURATION0.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$', not required
$NOTIFICATION-CONFIGURATION0.uid: regex UID, STRING, '^\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}$', required, same to $NOTIFICATION-CONFIGURATION0

$TOPIC.name: regex name, STRING, '^\w+[A-Za-z0-9-]*$', not required, example:sns-topic

resource.TopicArn: regex ARN(filled by RW), STRING, not required
resource.Name: regex name, required, example:sns-topic

resource.SubscriptionArn: regex ARN(filled by RW), STRING, not required
